org.aludratest.content.separated

Interface SeparatedContent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContentHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WebdecsSeparatedContent

    public interface SeparatedContent
extends ContentHandler
    Content Handler for separated file formats (like CSV or tab-separated).
    Author:
    Volker Bergmann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeReader(Object readerId)
      Closes a reader.
      void closeWriter(Object writerId)
      Closes the writer and returns its content as string.

    • Method Detail

      • createWriter

        Object createWriter(Writer out,
                    Class<? extends SeparatedFileBeanData> beanClass,
                    char separator,
                    String header)
        Creates a writer object for persisting SeparateFileBeans.
        Parameters:
        out - the writer to use for persisting the file content
        beanClass - the type of Java objects to write
        separator - the separator character to use
        header - the file herader to write
        Returns:
        the id of the new writer

      • writeRow

        void writeRow(SeparatedFileBeanData rowBean,
              Object writerId)
        Appends a row to the flat file writer denoted by the writerId.
        Parameters:
        rowBean - the FlatFileBean holding the data
        writerId - the id of the writer with which to store the formatted text

      • closeWriter

        void closeWriter(Object writerId)
        Closes the writer and returns its content as string.
        Parameters:
        writerId - the id of the writer to close

      • createReader

        <T extends SeparatedFileBeanData> Object createReader(Reader source,
                                                      Class<T> rowType,
                                                      char separator)
        Creates a reader object for reading JavaBeans.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the child class type of SeparatedFileBeanData to use
        Parameters:
        source - the source reader that provides the flat file's character data
        rowType - the RowTypeData
        separator - the separator character to use
        Returns:
        the id of the writer

      • readHeader

        String readHeader(Object readerId)
        Reads a file header row.
        Parameters:
        readerId - the id of the reader
        Returns:
        the content of the file header

      • readRow

        SeparatedFileBeanData readRow(Object readerId)
        Reads a flat file cell and provides it as Java object.
        Parameters:
        readerId - the id of the reader
        Returns:
        the id of the new reader

      • closeReader

        void closeReader(Object readerId)
        Closes a reader.
        Parameters:
        readerId - the id of the reader to close
